TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContractBehaviorAttribute

summary.span: 指定其实现 接口的属性处于活动状态的协定。

span.span: Specifies the contract for which an attribute that implements the interface is active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对一个同时为 对象的属性实现 接口可以对服务类型使用该协定行为属性，但会将此属性的使用限定为 属性中指定的协定。Implement the interface on an attribute that is also an object to enable the use of that contract behavior attribute on a service type but restrict its application to the contract specified in the property. 不要求在自定义协定行为属性上实现 ，如果该属性应用到协定接口或双向回调类，则将忽略 属性的值。There is no requirement to implement on custom contract behavior attributes, and if the attribute is applied either to a contract interface or to a duplex callback class the value of the property is ignored. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例假定自定义 实现调用了可提供“单一实例”行为的 `ObjectProviderBehavior`，它始终返回同一服务实例，且不回收该服务实例。The following code example assumes a custom implementation called `ObjectProviderBehavior` that provides a "singleton" behavior; it always returns the same service instance and does not recycle it. 对于实例提供程序自定义的插入，该示例演示了如何实现一个自定义属性 (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`)，该自定义属性可实现 ，从而插入自定义服务实例提供程序。To insert the instance provider customization, the example shows how to implement a custom attribute (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`) that implements to insert the custom service instance provider. 它还实现了 ，这会将其应用程序绑定到 `ISampleService` 协定。It also implements , which binds its application to the `ISampleService` contract. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetContract As Type
public: property Type ^ TargetContract { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用该协定行为的协定的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the contract to which the contract behavior is applicable.

value.span: 适用于该协定行为的协定。

span.span: The contract to which the contract behavior is applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性可以在将实现 属性应用到服务类时，指定该协定行为要应用到的协定。Implement the property to specify the contract to which the contract behavior is applied when the implementing attribute is applied to a service class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例假定自定义 实现调用了可提供“单一实例”行为的 `ObjectProviderBehavior`，它始终返回同一服务实例，且不回收该服务实例。The following code example assumes a custom implementation called `ObjectProviderBehavior` that provides a "singleton" behavior; it always returns the same service instance and does not recycle it. 对于实例提供程序自定义的插入，该示例演示了如何实现一个自定义属性 (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`)，该自定义属性可实现 ，从而插入自定义服务实例提供程序。To insert the instance provider customization, the example shows how to implement a custom attribute (`SingletonBehaviorAttribute`) that implements to insert the custom service instance provider. 它还实现了 ，这会将其应用程序绑定到 `ISampleService` 协定。It also implements , which binds its application to the `ISampleService` contract. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#2)]
